segments.text: S :: Welcome to Flash Foto.What can I do for you , ma ’ am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: C :: I ’ d like to have this roll of film developed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: S :: What size prints would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: C :: Four by six will do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: S :: All right , ma ’ am , they ’ ll be ready for you in an hour .
segments.speaker: S1
